review_data.title: Отличный завтрак :)

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: The decorations were nice. However the food is not up to standard and could be alot better. The beer however was not too bad.

review_data.title: Just and only pretentious
review_data.content: We were invited there for a Social Dinner. Location is in Old Town Zurich, the restaurant is fairly elegand but the food is far less than average. Typically swiss, but everiday's quality with understandard preparation. Would NOT return, my expectations were far higher. A great...More

review_data.title: Good food - high prices - staff friendly
review_data.content: The food was very good - but also the prices are very "good" - mean: high. The service-staff very friendly and helpful. We will come back.
